title: Calories in 7-Eleven Taquitos
meta_description: Discover calories in 7-Eleven taquitos, including macros like carbs, protein, and fat per taquito, plus tweaks and FAQs for quick nutrition insights.
assumptions: Standard single 7-Eleven chicken taquito, fried in corn tortilla with typical fillings; no added dips or sides.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by flavor (chicken, beef, etc.), preparation, brand batch, and size. Check 7-Eleven packaging or app for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 7-Eleven taquito has about 220 kcal, with 25 g carbs and 8 g protein.

label_note: Values mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one 7-Eleven taquito?
faqs.a: Approximately 220 kcal for a standard chicken taquito.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in 7-Eleven taquitos?
faqs.a: About 25 g carbs per taquito, mostly from the tortilla.
Yes, around 450 mg sodium per taquito due to seasoning and frying.

faqs.q: Calories in 7-Eleven beef taquitos vs chicken?
faqs.a: Beef versions have ~250 kcal, slightly higher fat than chicken's 220 kcal.
Opt for baked options or pair with veggies; avoid extra dips to cut calories.
